message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you for $85, reflecting its true worth while allowing you to enjoy a special discount. I look forward to your response and the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but $85 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to accommodate your needs. In light of that, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $78. This price reflects a reasonable compromise, ensuring you receive a high-quality product while keeping the cost within your desired range. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and looks forward to your positive response.
